qas.question: What religions and idea of thought is heresy cited as being used frequently in?
Blasphemy is the acceptance of what teachings?
What religions no longer recognize blasphamy?

context: The term is usually used to refer to violations of <b1_0>important religious teachings<b1_0/>, but is used also of views strongly opposed to any generally accepted ideas. It is used in particular in reference to <a0_0><b2_0>Christianity, Judaism, Islam and Marxism<b2_0/><a0_0/>.
